question: Which are the two territories that form endemic habitats of the "White-breasted thrasher"?
explanation: The White-breasted thrasher, also known as Goj blan, is a bird species that forms its endemic habitat in Martinique and Saint Lucia, two of the major islands in the Lesser Antilles archipelago in the West Indies region of the Caribbean Sea. According to IUCN's Red List of Threatened Species, it is an "endangered" bird species. The survival of this bird species is mainly threatened due to habitat destruction.
